com.mateus.towerdefense.controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mateus.towerdefense.controller.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the physics and ai aspect of the game.

      • createCollisionBody

        public void createCollisionBody(float x,
                                float y,
                                float width,
                                float height)
        Creates a collision body on x and y with the height and width. A collision body is a body that is used to avoid a player to build on top of it.
        Parameters:
        x - X position.
        y - Y position.
        width - Width of the body.
        height - Height of the body.
